org.takes.facets.auth

Class RqWithAuth

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.takes.rq.RqWrap
      • org.takes.facets.auth.RqWithAuth
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Request

    public final class RqWithAuth
extends RqWrap
    Request with already authenticated identity.

    This class is very useful for unit testing, when you need to test a "take" that requires a request to contain an already authenticated user.

    The class is immutable and thread-safe.

    Since:
    0.18
    Version:
    $Id: 5f69e0a364b55f4a43cf97e2f510a7c68e662a2f $
    Author:
    Yegor Bugayenko (yegor@teamed.io)
